General.Name: Ventec International Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Ventec International Group Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells copper clad laminates and prepreg bonding materials. The company's products include standard FR4, lead free assembly, halogen free products, tec-thermal/thermal management and insulated metal substrate, polyimide, tec-speed/signal integrity and high frequency products, flex/flex rigid products, plastic interleaver and release film consumables, drill entry and exit material, copper foils and ACF, and masslam and drill products, as well as products for special applications. Its products are used for the fabrication of various printed circuit board and associated applications. In addition, the company engages in the general investment and international trade business. Further, it operates in China, the United Kingdom, the United States, Germany, and Taiwan. Ventec International Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Suzhou, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: The Grand Pavilion Commercial Centre, Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands, 32052
